DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective of this study is to determine whether impaired glucose tolerance is improved to a greater degree by Tarka than Hyzaar in subjects with metabolic syndrome
DOC.brief_title: Tarka vs. Hyzaar in Patients With Metabolic Syndrome (STAR)
DOC.criteria: Metabolic syndrome Fasting blood glucose between 100 mg/dL and 125 mg/dL Hypertension One additional criteria, Exclusion 1 Subject has a current diagnosis of Type 1 or Type 2 diabetes mellitus. Subject has a hypersensitivity to ACE inhibitor, ARB, CCB, clonidine, methyldopa, hydralazine, or thiazide diuretic medication.
